publications.name: 5GPT: 5G Vulnerability Detection by Combining Zero-Shot Capabilities of GPT-4 With Domain Aware Strategies Through Prompt Engineering
publications.publisher: IEEE Transactions on Information Forensics and Security
publications.summary: Can LLMs like GPT-4 analyze complex cellular protocol specifications to identify security vulnerabilities? We discovered that out-of-the-box GPT-4 has impressive capabilities in flagging ogical inconsistencies and procedural flaws, but it also hallucinates, provides false positives, and struggles to detect deep protocol issues. To remedy this, we teach GPT-4 to think like a telecom-security expertâ€“ what properties must hold, how they fail, and how hazards indicators are exploited by adversaries. The result is a scalable, powerful, efficient black-box framework that can uncover subtle, protocol-level attack vectors that would otherwise slip through the cracks.

publications.name: Inceptive Transformers: Enhancing Contextual Representations through Multi-Scale Feature Learning Across Domains and Languages
publications.summary: A modular, lightweight, plug-and-play architecture for enhancing the contextual representations of any encoder model. Improves EIGHT PLM baselines across FIVE tasks for both short/long texts in English and Bangla.

projects.name: WhiskerDocs: A health-care solution for your pets
projects.summary: Everything you need for the well-being of your furry friends. Search for weird symptoms to know what they mean, book an appointment with a nearby vet based on your current location, have all history and prescriptions saved in your dashboard. If you're a vet, you can set your schedules, find prescription templates with auto completion, see history of all your patients, and write blogs to help pet owners out.

projects.name: Rasterization and Ray-tracing
projects.summary: Developed the raster-based graphics pipeline used in OpenGL from scratch. Implemented a ray-casting and recursive ray-tracing application using OpenGL and Phong lighting model.

Photorealistic 3D rendering with appropriate lighting, reflections, and textures

projects.name: DC-Vegas: A Congestion Control Algorithm for Datacenters
projects.summary: Aims to achieve the excellent performances of DC-TCP congestion control algorithms in datacenters at the low deployment cost of TCP-Vegas algorithm. NS2 simulation shows that DC-Vegas can produce better throughput and packet delivery ratios than TCP-Vegas.

projects.name: Subset C Compiler
projects.summary: Given a .c input file, this compiler scans the .c file for specific tokens, performs a syntax and semantics analysis, and finally, if the source code does not contain any error, generates assembly code for Intel 8086 assembly language.
